summary:
In this mod, I collected music that will transform and diversify your Skyrim.
Mod adds a bit of music to the cities, taverns, music for travel and dungeons, as well as optionally you can set music for battles with bosses and replace music in the main menu.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff0000]       A[/color][color=#93c47d]tmospheric music from games[/color][/b][/font]
[/size]
[i][b]                                                                                                                                                 [color=#ff0000][size=5]89 songs[/size][/color][/b][/i]


[font=Comic Sans MS]

[size=3][color=#ff0000]M[/color]usic from games: Dragon Age origins, Dragon age 2, Dragon age inquisition, Disciples 3, The witcher 3 wild hunt, Lineage II, Darkest dungeon, Heroes of might and magic: 3, 4 and 5, Fable and other.
[/size]

[color=#93c47d]R[/color]equirements: Skyrim or Skyrim SE.


[color=#ff0000]U[/color]pdate: If you used only my mod then just delete the "music" folder from the Data folder, and then install the new version

[color=#93c47d]C[/color]ompatibility: not compatible with other mods changing music, my mod will simply replace them, compatible with mods for sounds.

[color=#ff0000]I[/color]nstallation: put the folder "music" in the folder Data.

[color=#ff0000]D[/color]elete: Delete the folder '' music "

[size=3][color=#93c47d]O[/color][color=#ff0000]ptional: I[/color][color=#ff0000]f you want to fight dragons for epic music, drag the folder "[/color][color=#ffffff]music[/color][color=#ff0000]'' from the folder "[/color][color=#ffffff]Epic Music for Battles with Bosses[/color][color=#ff0000]" [/color][color=#ff0000]to the folder "[/color][color=#ffffff]Data[/color][color=#ff0000]"[/color]
